channel.title: Project Outlast, trying something new
channel.description:
[b]Hello a while ago I started a joke project just to see how far I would get, and I've come along ways and its been pretty awesome. I'm here to show you what I've done and if there's anyone who has any criticism or ideas for me to add would be fantastic.[/b]
I used the base Project Insanity to help develop this project.
[b]Features[/b]
-Good karma, Bad karma system -Bad karma has the capability to enslave other players and gain a reward. -Good karma players gain a reward by slaying those of evil karma and can place a bounty on their head if they want. -Start out as a slave escape, (first quest) then begin your adventure throughout the world of project outlast. -Choose your starter and training method. -Unique items catered to each karma system. -Various different quests which have various rewards. -Certain objectives can only be completed if player has a certain karma. -Great stability -Perfected Combat, range, melee, mage. -Interesting approach to the game, a lot of future potential. -Lots of different ways to play. -Revamped many different variants of economy. -Ingame highscores -Unique shops buy and sell, barter system. Higher the players barter the more they get for selling and item, less they get the item for. -Players can repair own equipment such as barrows, vestas with a certain level of repair skills which is linked with smithing. -Areas are discovered then have the ability to teleport to them.
[b]Updates to come[/b] -New custom items added in -More unique quests for players to complete -Unique areas for players to explore -Unique monsters for players to battle and receive loot -Clan system where those of Evil karma join together against those who are good. -More...
[b]Media[/b]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img912/3607/3SI8Xu.png[/img]
http://gyazo.com/650a0305c5b440cb1b869037ae8fa09b

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img909/5150/0RiYZW.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img537/6600/R4dQ6F.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img537/648/BcreX3.png[/img]
Highscores [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img538/9188/fPhsAQ.png[/img]
http://gyazo.com/a0d000e5d6dd513b2b162048e54b6dc1
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img540/8692/AcWmXq.png[/img]
http://gyazo.com/e441fe949197654aa7fe68648b06a734
[b]UPDATES:[/b]
-Good karma/bad karma shops -bounty hunter supply shops, points increase with each kill. -items for each karma side shop items have certain bonuses. -3 quests added -Grappling hook and rope added for access to new locations. -Perks added 5 of them so far. (Cannibal, Lawbringer, Evil doer, Savior, Satan) -cannibal perk allows for players to regain health from feasting on dead players (sounds insane but unique) -satan perk allows you to increase slaver points 2x every time you kill those of good karma.

item.title: Project Outlast, trying something new
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

RandQm:

Looks fun but I think you’ll need a lot of activity around the concept as players might get bored fast.

Very true, trying to add a custom item called the mesmetron, ever play fallout 3? That’s what its from lol. To daze players for up to 15 seconds, same animation as the entangle spell. Then players of Bad karma have the option to kill them for a reward of cash. Also adding followers, not just pets but humans as well. Ex. Solider, bandit, barbarian ect. And you can give them different commands on what to do. This project may take a while but im hoping to finish it out! Thanks for the feedback, if anyone has any suggestions just let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Outlast, trying something new
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Hello a while ago I started a joke project just to see how far I would get, and I’ve come along ways and its been pretty awesome. I’m here to show you what I’ve done and if there’s anyone who has any criticism or ideas for me to add would be fantastic.

I used the base Project Insanity to help develop this project.

Features

-Good karma, Bad karma system
-Bad karma has the capability to enslave other players and gain a reward.
-Good karma players gain a reward by slaying those of evil karma and can place a bounty on their head if they want.
-Start out as a slave escape, (first quest) then begin your adventure throughout the world of project outlast.
-Choose your starter and training method.
-Unique items catered to each karma system.
-Various different quests which have various rewards.
-Certain objectives can only be completed if player has a certain karma.
-Great stability
-Perfected Combat, range, melee, mage.
-Interesting approach to the game, a lot of future potential.
-Lots of different ways to play.
-Revamped many different variants of economy.
-Ingame highscores
-Unique shops buy and sell, barter system. Higher the players barter the more they get for selling and item, less they get the item for.
-Players can repair own equipment such as barrows, vestas with a certain level of repair skills which is linked with smithing.
-Areas are discovered then have the ability to teleport to them.

Updates to come
-New custom items added in
-More unique quests for players to complete
-Unique areas for players to explore
-Unique monsters for players to battle and receive loot
-Clan system where those of Evil karma join together against those who are good.
-More…

Media

http://gyazo.com/650a0305c5b440cb1b869037ae8fa09b

Highscores

http://gyazo.com/a0d000e5d6dd513b2b162048e54b6dc1

http://gyazo.com/e441fe949197654aa7fe68648b06a734

UPDATES:

-Good karma/bad karma shops
-bounty hunter supply shops, points increase with each kill.
-items for each karma side shop items have certain bonuses.
-3 quests added
-Grappling hook and rope added for access to new locations.
-Perks added 5 of them so far. (Cannibal, Lawbringer, Evil doer, Savior, Satan)
-cannibal perk allows for players to regain health from feasting on dead players (sounds insane but unique)
-satan perk allows you to increase slaver points 2x every time you kill those of good karma.

Cannibal quest
http://gyazo.com/3df8f06a4398ef3b52975e27298c584d
Quest interface1
http://gyazo.com/2eb4358511682e1bbec9be3a2ad8a9b8
Quest interface2
http://gyazo.com/9d925276080dc5804c9a3977b362137b

Updates:
-Pets
-some new items

http://gyazo.com/88c343e0e2927bd2b04e14ba4a44682e

Read full topic
